hero.title: <0>Service and Experience</0> Platform for University Students
hero.description: Discover a reliable student network for tutoring, software, design, translation and more within the campus. Share your talent, earn income and meet new people.

items.title: Tutoring
items.desc: Math, physics, foreign languages and more.

items.title: Software & IT
items.desc: Web development, mobile apps, data analysis.

motivation.title: Our Motivation
motivation.p1: We know that university years are not just about classes. We wanted to create a secure and student-focused space where you can both improve yourself and relax economically.
motivation.p2: Üni-İş is a platform that aims to carry the existing sharing culture on campus to the digital environment, allowing students to support each other, make their talents visible and gain experience with real projects.

steps.title: Create Your Profile
steps.desc: Add your university, department, skills and a short biography describing you so that other students can find you safely. Stand out with your profile photo and scores.

steps.title: Post a Listing and Find a Listing
steps.desc: Open a listing for tutoring, software project, design work or special talents. Easily discover suitable listings on your campus by category, location and description using filters.

steps.title: Discuss Details via Messages
steps.desc: Clarify time, price, expectations and project details with real-time messaging. Track all your conversations in one place; contribute to the community by evaluating after the job is done.

benefits.title: Give Lessons
benefits.desc: Keep your knowledge fresh and earn income by teaching subjects you know.

benefits.title: Get Service
benefits.desc: Get the support you need from student friends at student-friendly prices.

benefits.title: Safe Community
benefits.desc: Easily distinguish reliable profiles with the scoring and comment system.

items.name: Ayşe, Computer Engineering
items.text: Thanks to Üni-İş, I started earning extra income with my front-end skills. I also met friends from the same department.

items.name: Mehmet, Business Administration
items.text: While looking for support for a finance class, I matched with a student from my department within a few hours. My grades improved significantly.

items.name: Zeynep, Psychology
items.text: I always find design support for presentations and project assignments here. The profile and comment system gives confidence.

items.name: Can, Electrical-Electronics
items.text: I give math lessons on weekends. It keeps my knowledge fresh and contributes to my monthly expenses.

items.name: Elif, English Language and Literature
items.text: I opened a listing for translation and speaking practice, I met many people from different departments. It offers a flexible working environment.

items.name: Burak, Industrial Engineering
items.text: Seeing on-campus listings in one place is a great convenience. We can discuss details quickly with the messaging system.
